summary: This mods makes whiterun EXTRA bumpy.
descriptionHtml:
Please note that this file is going to replace EVERY whiterun textures, so make yourself a backup of your own textures.

This mod is going to add huge bumps on whiterun textures, like on the walls, floor n stuff.
I\'m not taking any credits for this because i\'m not feeling like it..

This may slowdown your computer or it may not, but there is a chance for that.

INSTALL; Copy this file to your Elder Scrolls: skyrim/Data folder.


My thoughts about my mod; Neeh, it\'s fine.. There are some points on the whiterun that i personally don\'t like because of the bumps not showing correctly with the lights, it may be a little bit too bumpy for you but if you like it, then you are free to use it with your own projects..

I made this mod just because i have too much time on my hand so i had to do something random, and there you go. Have Fun.

BEWARE; i\'m not going to update any textures or or repair the package, this is my first and last thing i\'m going to share with you guys, i didnt\'t want to throw the hours of work to the recycle bin and now you guys may have them, anyway enough talking..
author: Calloweri
